website_summaries.verdict: A reusable soft wrap for male dogs that helps you protect your furniture and floors while house-training.
pros: Company also makes a similar product for female dogs
Comes in small, medium, and large sizes
Hook-and-loop strap is secure and can adjust for a secure fit on your dog
cons: These wraps seem to run a little large

customer_reviews.title: The pee almost never leaks onto the diaper and when it does it's easy to throw in the sink or washer and leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I read way too many dog diaper reviews. I had tried disposable and a different brand. Nope. This was my last resort. I was told by my vet to put men's bladder pads from Walmart $2.86 for a pack of 18 in them instead of buying expensive liners so did. It's literally changed my life. The pee almost never leaks onto the diaper and when it does it's easy to throw in the sink or washer and leaves no lingering smell or stain. I would buy a size up from what you'd think though. L is snug on my 21 pound dog. Get them.
customer_reviews.author: Dh1283

customer_reviews.title: Saved my carpet
customer_reviews.text: I love these so much!!! I cannot imagine trying to potty train a formerly stray chihuahua without these! They’ve saved my carpet and my sanity. It took him a few days to get used to wearing them, but he doesn’t mind now. They’re absorbent enough that you don’t have to use a maxi pad underneath, but I like to use pads to minimize laundry. Medium fits him perfectly. He weighs around 14 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lakenan

customer_reviews.title: Stays on great!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many male wraps for my doggie that marks on any and everything! These stay on great and the maxi pad stays in place too (do not but doggie pads). Just wish the colors were more "manly"... :-)
customer_reviews.author: AdvoShark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Excellent quality. Wash well.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! They don't bunch up like other wraps out there. They stay pretty flat against his nether regions. He is still comfortable enough to chase his tennis ball around for hours. Excellent product. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TeeForTwo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Change of Product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed that this product has been changed! We purchased 2 sets in early 2018 and they have fit and worked perfectly for our shih tzus urine leaking. Went to stock up on more recently and received a product with double the length velcro. So now all of that extra velcro will be exposed, gathering lint and getting stuck on his blankets. Please be aware that the current product photo is NOT what the product looks like now. Inaccurate representation. Sending back and starting a new search for male dog wraps.
customer_reviews.author: ChiVeg86

customer_reviews.title: Way too big; velcro came right off
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dogs to be certain to order the right size. These are very large and my pug wriggles right out of them. Also, on the second or third use, the velcro pad ripped right off the material. On closer inspection, the velcro is only sewed on with one row of stitches. By contrast the other brand (same design) that I own was not only sized properly, but the velcro is attached by a double-row of stitching. I'll stick with the first brand. This wasn't worth the couple of bucks I saved.
customer_reviews.author: G Love

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these doggie diapers three times. They are easy to get on and off, VERY absorbent, eaddy to wash, and they don't chafe my Maltese. The only issue I have is that the smalls are a tad too small but the mediums are a tiny bit large and my dog sometimes can wriggle out of them if I don't make sure to attach them securely. I order the mediums and just double check my dog several times a day. Otherwise I recommend these to any dog owner whose dog is experiencing incontinence.
customer_reviews.author: T. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Lacking quality control
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. The fist order was perfect. The area where the Velcro overlaps is great. On the second order, the gripper part of the Velcro fastener faces out and the loop overlaps however the gripper part is HUGE. It’s so much more of the gripper Velcro that it’s exposed and snags on everything making these bands unusable! I have wasted my money. The two orders are identical but the product are not consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Really great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my little chihuahua and they work really well. He is just about a year old but has been marking around my house if left alone for to long. We have been crate training but when I am home it was hard to keep an eye on him all the time. These were the best purchase. The first time I put them on he wasn’t the happiest but now he likes wearing them and have been super easy to wash. I am planning on buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Large size fits 76 lb. Dog comfortably, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: My started to dog mark some places in our house after some pet visitors apparently did. And he continues. Maybe he will never stop. I searched online for some solutions and one of the solutions was to try a belly band. I didn't want disposable as he is not fully relieving himself, just marking. These work for us. I put it on him when I go out for a bit or to work and he surprisingly has it on when I get home. No chaffing or discomfort noted. No more random stinky squirts to clean up in my house. I toss them into the washer with some laundry detergent. They're very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Iquwah

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best belly bands we've tried
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best belly bands we've tried. We are fostering a senior Chihuahua who is not housebroken. We try to take him out every time he wakes from a nap, but sometimes are a bit late. These washable belly bands are lifesavers! When he has an accident, these bands soak up the urine and keep it away from his skin, while preventing leaks and staying dry on the outside. We also love the large velcro band that allows us to fit it perfectly to his little body, which is slender near his back legs and larger around his belly. Will be purchasing another set! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: K Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Work great for my Toy Poodle!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful if you have an old dog. No more accidents! These fit great (size S for toy poodle). I also bought another brand..Wegreeco...and I like these better...Wegreeco is fine but these work a bit better cause they are a bit wider and longer. They are colorful, very soft, very absorbent. I put a cheap, thin bladder control pad inside, so I just change the bladder pad when needed and only wash the whole belly band once or twice a week. They wash up great. Cant say enough positive things about them. They are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great for when I run out of male doggie diapers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking it would be a wrap to go over my dog's diapers, but that's not really what it is. It's got a built in pad and works at stopping accidental peeing when I'm out of disposable dog wraps. It's maching washable, (or hand wash), and stays securly on my little guy. The velcro is super strong so these stay in place. The picture above is not the right wrap, but I wanted to give you an idea of Cooper's size. He is about 12 lbs. and wears a small.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen M. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Not great for small breeds. TOO WIDE!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small dog, this diaper may fit around the waist nicely, but it will be way too wide for him. I have a 16 yr old longhaired chubby chihuahua and it covered his entire groin and chest all the way up under his armpits. He looked adorable but he was very uncomfortable for so many reasons The velcro strip is so strong and long that it was extremely difficult to pull it apart without distressing my poor old dog.. I had no choice but to return them.
customer_reviews.author: 3pups+1kitten+1hub

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got the large for my Cavalier King Charles Spaniel. Cooper loves putting on his "pants". It has completely solved our overnight marking problem, and he enjoys wearing it. Three in the pack, just perfect for daily washing, two days drying in the sunlight and always having a clean pair. Cute colors too. EXTREMELY well made (I sew and could not design or make anything better), quite ample. I would perhaps not have the elastic so tight, or make one side without elastic, but it's a personal choice. Love, love, love these and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosenfeld

customer_reviews.title: ADD A DISPOSABLE PAD FOR BEST RESULTS
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need to have a liner (pad) if you want this to work for more than one per episode. The absorbency is fine, but the odor is awful once it is wet- like burning rubber is the closest I can get to describing it! Plus, my incontinent senior pees a dozen times per day, and I can't run a washing machine multiple times daily! I found that placing a disposable pads worked great and that costs less than the disposable wraps since I only needed 1 or 2 pads a day vs 4 or 5 disposable wraps. I recommend that you use a powerful oxi clean laundry detergent, as it is difficult to get the odor out.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan G.

customer_reviews.title: The small size is HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased bands for my dog before. I have a 7lb Yorkie. The size small are huge and unusable for him. They cover almost his entire body, so he is extremely uncomfortable wearing them. The small from this seller is similar to medium from other sellers and brands I have ordered in the past. The quality of the product seems good, but the sizing is way off. They were inexpensive and I used a credit, so returning them is not worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: jessleigh

customer_reviews.title: Would be better large. Another helpful idea are overnight incontinence pads
customer_reviews.text: My mini Schnauzer, who is tall, weighs 30lbs. I got the medium. Would be better large. Another helpful idea are overnight incontinence pads, I got poise, cut them in half and put it inside. This helps. Otherwise, not obsorbent enough. My schnauzer had bladder stones surgery with incontinence after. Humans can have it too after this type of surgery. The issue turned out also to be diabetes. Think the stress due to the surgery. Had not been there in lab work before. Definitely get the pads. Only slight inconvenience these will do the trick. Heavy these will need some help. Very handy to have. Washes easily in machine. Overall would buy again...only larger
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve tried...sanity saver
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these a week now and couldn’t be happier. I have an overweight Pomeranian-American Eskimo mix who is a snot and has been marking everything in my house since the day we rescued him (oh, and he marks people too) He’s totally trashed the floors and doors in my house. I’ve tried other belly bands, which don’t deter him, and they always leaked, even with another pad inside. So far, these are great...waterproof outside, inside holds plenty of liquid with no leaking and no seeping through and they fit him! I am planning to order more so I don’t have to constantly be washing them. I can walk through my house and not step in puddles!!
customer_reviews.author: JoanneCat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and price
customer_reviews.text: We have a senior beagle boy, who has now suffered four strokes within the last 18 months. Even though he's recovered about 90%, he's still challenged going outside to do his business. I don't know if he's now incontinent because of age (about 14) or from the strokes, but, I purchased these (along with heavy flow pads) to put on him during the day, as well as every night. I love the extra long velcro closure strip as it makes it easier to adjust the fit, and the elastic in the front and back, helps to avoid leakage. I highly recommend these for any incontinent issues for a male dog.
customer_reviews.author: Nutsfordogs

customer_reviews.title: Bad design choice on the longer Velcro strip - dog can take these off at will
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchase these and I was quite happy with them. The reorder product, however, now has an extra-long Velcro strip exposed which 1.) has no paired counterpart on the inside, which causes the deterioration of the wrap material and 2.) leaves a 3" piece of Velcro exposed that allows my dog to take it off at will since he has figured out all he has to do is roll on a rug or dog bed to get the wrap stuck to it and then he can pull out of it. Which he just did, again. As is, I will not order this product again unless I see that the Velcro has been redesigned. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marion Karhatsu

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: These have been helpful; VELCRO IS GREAT AND DOES HOLD, well made, wash up well too. Problem: my dog often wiggles out of them, especially at night. I have done them tight, and any tighter would not be good for the dog, but I have has to use a suspender set up to keep them on. (oh well) Additionally, place a diaper insert (see those used with baby cloth diapers), which then help hold urine. Perhaps it is that my dog is having more issues than most. Good value though.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Holtz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: So we’ve been using these for a few days, he hasn’t actually peed in them (yet) so I’m not sure about the quality beyond what I can see/feel- but so happy to have these! Peace of mind! Our Koda is 3/4 Pyrenees 1/4 border collie mix, he on occasion will lift his leg and pee a little to mark. I was going crazy finding pee on blankets, sides of the beds, etc. This gives me such peace of mind, no more worrying that he will pee anywhere in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great belly bands!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was ordering medium for my Bulldog, but I could barely stretch these on to him. The size is not printed on them, so I figured the mediums just run small, but it looks like this order is actually for small. Thinking I had medium, I ordered more in large, and they fit him perfectly with plenty of room to adjust for a larger dog, as he’s only about 54 lbs. The medium would probably fit his size. They are great quality, clean up easily, and I have the britches for my older girl as well. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: smrose2005

customer_reviews.title: Love these Wraps!
customer_reviews.text: These wraps are Great ! Make Sure you measure properly! This company has a awesome product and sizing is spot on ,I measured my 16 lb poodle and he measured 20 inchs ,going by the chart i was wrong i should have ordered a medium but past experiences with another companies dog wraps i went a size larger...DONT do that these are sized correctly,I am keeping them and going to sew them to the size I need .This was my fault ,they are so soft and absorbent and love the the colors ....Wash them separately or put the Velcro together or they become attached to the other laundry. The Velcro is very strong..
customer_reviews.author: Karen C.

customer_reviews.title: Pee free carpets, yay!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since my family uses this brand. I couldn’t be happier. Fits very nice. Velcro isn’t rough to touch. The elastic is soft and doesn’t faze my dog. These are a million times better than disposable. It doesn’t cut into his legs or stomach, and he doesn’t have to adjust his sitting or lying down positions. Covers his penis perfectly and even though i allow him to wear it looser (since he has a lot of fur) the elastic fits well against his body. Very happy with my purchase, so i just boyght a second order.
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Prevent piddles perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes to pee on my bed and the couch when he’s left alone, but if he’s wearing his diaper there are no issues. He doesn’t actually pee in them, so I can’t comment on their absorbency, but for my use they are 100% effective and easy to use. It’s more of a deterrent, but it works. They’re easy to put on and seem comfortable. They also clean well in the wash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ) He weighs 9 pounds and I bought the small which fits perfect. Easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: This works. We have a 5 year old Malti-Poo that still has issues with peeing in the house....now that he wears one of these he never pees in it when he wears it. I take it off when he goes outside and put it back on when he comes inside. This has been a huge stress relief for me, he is also already used to it after a few days! He comes to me after he has been outside to have it put back on, I knew he was smarter than we gave him credit for ;) He weighs 9 pounds and I bought the small which fits perfect. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Byram

customer_reviews.title: These Work Well and Last Forever
customer_reviews.text: We adopted a 10 years old miniature poodle with "issues". He lived another 5 years and he wore several of these everyday. We lined them with pantyliners. They were easy to put on and off, they washed beautifully, and lasted forever. I recommend closing the substantial velcro flaps before washing to keep foreign threads out. I also recommend a cheap diaper pail.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Velcro must be industial strength--MUCH too strong.
customer_reviews.text: The products LOOKED nice; however, I have a shih-tzu w/moderately long hair. His hair would have become embedded in the super-strong Velcro fastener. Additionally, anything he came into contact with (my clothing, afghans, etc. would have caused damage to PRY the Velcro loose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Looks good and feels even better
customer_reviews.text: My Havanese is 14 1/2 lbs and the small was a little small but still fits due to the large velcro on this. I also bought the medium and it's a little large, but again the large velcro enclosures make it fit. It is a great value for the money and looks and feels luxurious. I had purchased a single dog wrap at Pet Smart for 3 times the amount and it doesn't come close to the coverage and feel of the 3 pack. I kept both sizes because they are such a good product and both sizes are usable.
customer_reviews.author: jrobin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Together
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have a Chihuahua who just won't completely pee outside. He has been a part of our family for about 12 years now, and it's been kind of rough. A friend at work told about using dog diapers and I laughed at first. After trying some disposable ones, I ordered a size Large in these for my Chihuahua (he has a 25 inch waist and a bit of a weight problem). They work great! I just put some pads in and put it on him! We are all happy again now cause he isn't peeing on the floor!
customer_reviews.author: April R.

customer_reviews.title: Working our great
customer_reviews.text: This is my second order for the Luxury Dog Wraps. My dog doesn't mind wearing them and they have been an answer to my problem. They are absorbent, do not leak and are easy to clean. I would recommend buying more than 3 (I now have 9 wraps) because I change them often and wash them by hand or machine and want them to be totally dry before I put one back on him. I only wish I had found these years ago but am so happy now that our home is dry and happy! :)
customer_reviews.author: yorkielover

customer_reviews.title: sounds like a lot of work but not really
customer_reviews.text: These work well for our old beagle. Had to get a bigger size. If in doubt go bigger. I rinse them off, soak in detergent water and then rinse off and plunge in vinegar and water and rinse again. sounds like a lot of work but not really. Hang to dry. You can machine wash too but Hand washing is better I think. Only gave 4 stars cause somehow my dog will slip these off. Tried going tighter, but he got them off more often. So I put them on just tight enough to keep them on. This must be more comfortable cause he slips out less now.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: We foster dogs and had a young dog with a UTI. These worked great so we could give him some freedom in the house without a lot of mess. We lined the inside with feminine pads so we could reuse the outer pad multiple times. He did pull it off a couple times, but generally left it on. We are definitely glad we bought them and like that they can simply be thrown in the washer and used again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Made way too big for little dogs..............
customer_reviews.text: These are made really wide and big, we ordered the small and they were way too wide and our dog had a problem walking with them on. He's a 6 lb. chihuahua mix and 15 and still wants to mark the house so got these to keep on him when he's inside during the day. Thought it would save the walls and furniture, which they did but they are made so big he had problems walking so had to order different ones in another brand. For a larger dog these would be perfect but not for the little ones.
customer_reviews.author: MaryD

customer_reviews.title: Great Belly Band!!!
customer_reviews.text: These work just as they are supposed to. The small is a little wider then I'd prefer but perhaps if they weren't they wouldn't be as effective. They work like a charm. We got a new puppy and my male tarted marking so we bought these and he stopped when he has this on. Also he had an accident when there was really loud thunder and it worked well for that too. It fully absorbed the urine and no leaks! Material is nice not cheap feeling-same quality as I felt in the expensive pet store. My pomeranian is 10 lbs and we purchased size small.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice, inexpensive solution to marking.
customer_reviews.text: I have two male dogs, we call them “Pee” and “Pee Over”. One marks everything, the other marks over the first one then that one comes back and does it again. We only have to use the belly band on the one that always marks first, since he doesn’t mark the other one doesn’t mark any more either. The bands are easy to apply and do not leak. I just toss them in the washer and air dry them.
customer_reviews.author: S. Core

customer_reviews.title: No puddles! Washing tip!
customer_reviews.text: Absorbency is decent, but our little guy has been drippy wet after a long day (8 hours) on a couple of occasions. Still soooo much better than dealing with soaked pee pads and blankets!!! For daily around the house it’s a major relief to be able to avoid puddles on the wood floor!! Be careful when washing to avoid using too much detergent which seems to “clog the pores” of the material and lessen absorbency. Go easy on detergent and add a little white vinegar or OxiClean. Seems to help get them fully clean and preserve absorbency.
customer_reviews.author: Cruzer

customer_reviews.title: Ideal! Great home savers!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things because i have 2 males who feel its necessary to have the age old peeing contest. I refuse to live in an animals toilet and these have saved my home, carpets, floors and sanity! And my dogs lives!! I would have given it 5 stars but the velcro is tough to undo. Less would defeat the purpose tho i guess but i still love these!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielleup10

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Like that these are wider and fully cover my weiner’s ween. We normally have problems with bands shifting and exposing him, but these bands are wide enough to give him plenty of room to not be squished. Plus, they fit around his belly securely so that he doesn’t wriggle out of them. We have a 12.8# dachshund.
customer_reviews.author: B H

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: These have saved my house!! The quality really lasts because we’ve washed these a million times. I would recommend sticking the velcro together before you put these in the wash, otherwise it’ll get stuck to other clothes. I’ve ordered a second time just so we have backups for when we don’t do laundry for awhile. Take a spray bottle of water, vinegar, and a drop of dish soap and spray it down before you put it in the wash and it’ll come out smelling fresh and clean.
customer_reviews.author: sara k

customer_reviews.title: Great For Older Bichon
customer_reviews.text: The elderly Bichon I took in three years has just begun to have the occasional accident even though I take him out several times a day. Since he stays on my bed I no longer worry about what will happen when he jumps down if I am outside or shopping. They do NOT need a pad and he has no issue with them at all. I do remove them at night since he is on the bed with me and will let me know if he needs to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna C. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppy potty training!!!
customer_reviews.text: My sanity wouldn't survive potty training our puppy without these! Purchased the small for a 3.5 month old 14lb male Boston terrier. He was 3 months old and 11lbs when we first purchased them and they were too big at that time. A few more pounds and they work just fine now. They do bunch up on him but the important part is covered :) and has caught many a squat and have saved me from having to shampoo floors and rugs. They hold a lot and have held up wash after wash really well. Way more cost effective than the disposables!
customer_reviews.author: The Bru Crew

customer_reviews.title: Dry dog, dry bed.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Chihuahua dog who cant hold his bladder all night. Since I have use these, we no longer worry about him and our bed. These are fantastic! They dont have elastic to them, which stops him from pulling them off. The Velcro is strong so my other dog cant pull it off of him either. The padding is thick and holds his urine with no leakage. I toss them in the washer and we are good to go. I originally purchased a pack of three. I loved them so much that I came back and ordered another 2.
customer_reviews.author: Dotty

customer_reviews.title: So this has been the best alternative to banishing him to the yard
customer_reviews.text: Well made and double lined in the right area. I have a large German Shepard who is house trained but still marks. So this has been the best alternative to banishing him to the yard. He doesn't particularly like me putting it on but one it's on I tell him to leave it and he doesn't bother it. Of course I have a very well behaved dog but unfortunately marking is done by nature and can't always be stopped so this is the best alternative I have found. Washable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: TeFlipp

customer_reviews.title: After wash pee smell doesn't go away.... wet inside.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product id you care for good fitted dog wrap. It has a strong velcro and water proof fabric with is awesome. My only problem is that after machine wash the pee smell still very strong so in the beginning I was confused and washed it twice, but it still didn't help. Also, after dog pees, it is stay pretty vet inside. And its just gross to keep your dog in the pee fo a some time, since you don't really know when exactly you dog peed.
customer_reviews.author: Alina Weinberger

customer_reviews.title: Add mitten clips for the best results
customer_reviews.text: These work well for our 14 1/2 yr old pug. They work best with a disposable inner pad. I use store-brand feminine hygiene pads, as dog-specific pads are too small and cost 10x as much! I have bleached these with no loss of color. They do slide off, so I added children's mitten clips as suspender. Now we have the perfect set up.
customer_reviews.author: LandscapeLisa

customer_reviews.title: See photo product does not absorb pee
customer_reviews.text: I have a very small toy poodle 8lbs, this item does not absorb his pee at all. Ii will be returning. I have purchased other brands in the past that work wonderfully. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Connie Edmundson

customer_reviews.title: Not as much padding as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it would be an okay product. The set I got had been used. Urine stain on it and covered in dog hair. Not as much padding as the other brand I bought. Has a ton of Velcro to keep it closed. I almost found it to be a bit too much. I prefer the other brand I got and will be returning these as they were previously used before I got them and not as much absorbant padding as the Wegreeco Washable Male Dog Diapers, which also have less Velcro but stay on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nio

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit. Too small
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have ordered this brand. The first time I ordered the medium size as my dogs measured 15. They fit but were very big on him. With that I ordered the small. These are tiny and I struggle to get them to fit. Moreover I live in Canada and originally ordered from the Amazon Canadian site but prices have doubled there so I waited to order these when I was traveling to the United States. Having these not fit has been a huge inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Elana

customer_reviews.title: Great for male dogs that mark!
customer_reviews.text: I just got a puppy who uses the doggy door at my house but at my dads he Mark's the furniture because they also have a male dog in their house so he wears these when we visit. He doesn't mind it at all. They are very absorbent and stay on well. Very easy to clean in the sink!
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Weisdorf

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, good price c your money and so ...
customer_reviews.text: Great colors , good price for your money and so far I washed them 5 times and still having it's vibrant colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My inconti-corgi is not as thrilled but he isn't completely put off. They are soft and have a pouch that is reinforced. The elastic is soft and the fabric kinda folds over it on the outside to keep liquid in. I added a 1/4 diaper pad that I cut. He can go on the couch again. We got Large.
customer_reviews.author: Theathegreat

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!!
customer_reviews.text: These are not even close to as good as the Wegreeco brand. Tried these because I liked the colors....Do not work well at all for my little guy!! To big and not as absorbent!! Keeping them as a back up tho.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: Used 1, did not work for my disabled french bulldog. Will not return since I used one, before he died.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Derx

customer_reviews.title: God send
customer_reviews.text: My lab has degenerative myelopathy and is now incontinent of urine. I was using makeshift pads to keep him clean. When these arrived finally I was happy. The large fit my 37# best friend well and are very absorbent. So much so that they take a day to dry fully. I also tried a brand with double strips of velcro but these did not fit as well. These are well worth the little bit extra they cost.
customer_reviews.author: SpiritualOne

customer_reviews.title: Hold odor if used by themselves
customer_reviews.text: I use these because I have two intact males that will mark. These need to be used with a disposable wrap underneath because they hold the odor and are not very easy to clean. I do not throw them in the washing machine anymore, I would have to soak them in an enzyme cleaner and hang them out to dry. Now I just use them to protect my males from chewing the disposables.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Tilot

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, soft and well made. Does have a really long hook side of the velcro so when on pup, several inches stick out from the overlap and when he rolls around on things such as the kitchen rug, the rug gets attached to it. The excess velcro would be good to make it adjustable for dogs less chunky than ours. If your dog isn't a dork who rolls on all rugs, clothes & bedding, like ours, it won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: A.B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for older dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 year old shih tzu that suffers from arthritis and he is starting to lose some muscle control, including his bladder. He is potty trained but was piddling all over. These diapers definitely do the trick and he is comfortable! My husband let him out for a full pee and the diaper got very full, for that I could see using a pad for extra protection for absorbency. Rinsed and washed well. Recommend for older dogs losing bladder control.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Goodman

customer_reviews.title: 10 Star
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 dogs, I have purchased 5 different brands of wraps to find the best. "I have found it" The detail in construction, and the large Velcro did it for me. Make it a 10 star. I will be ordering 10 more. Up date. Now have 15 they are just the best. Use The Super best maxi pads and cut them in 1/2. the Wraps stay dry for many uses. The wraps with the special pads have made our home, travel, over night stays with the dogs a dream. Suggest Pet Magasin team up with the brand we use and corner the market.
customer_reviews.author: Critic

customer_reviews.title: Best “diapers” for my little guys
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I have a 7 pound Maltese and an 11 pound Silky-Maltese and the small fits both of them perfectly. The Maltese is an especially dedicated “spot marker”, and I’ve never had a problem with leaks or wetness, even when not using an additional pad. The Silky Maltese only wears his when he has misbehaved...he gets extremely embarrassed and pouty as soon as he hears the Velcro coming his way. :) I’ve washed them many times and they are still in great condition. I’m definitely going to buy more to add to the rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my male Chihuahua.
customer_reviews.text: He wears these bands at night. They stay on him. The Velcro is excellent. It keeps him from marking at night. I would buy these again. They clean up with soap and water. I wash them in the bathroom sink, then I hang them up to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Anything for this face!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie weighs ten pounds and was recently diagnosed with diabetes. It's been a tough adjustment. We found that he had random potty accidents. I bought four types of disposable diapers and let's just say, beside leaks, cutting the whole for the tail, the house was a mess! None of us could handle it. Then, I discovered these bands, hallelujah!! My dog was happy and clean, I was happy and the house is clean! It's the best $8 I've ever spent. With Prime and my order that placed the day before Christmas Eve, I still got them in two days! I will only buy this brand from now on!! Plus, they wash and dry like a dream!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Go for a size smaller - I have a Lhasa Apso
customer_reviews.text: I like them but I measured my dog and I got the size recommended. I should of got a size smaller because they fall off sometimes. They are too big. I took the time to measure him with the tape measure and I'm a little disappointed that they fall off in the middle of the night. However when they are on they are better than any other band or diaper I have bought and trust me I've bought a lot. So they are very good. Minus the measurement chart.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: I would buy these again if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I needed these for my new little dog who is having trouble marking around the house. I originally ordered the wrong size. My fat little part-weiner dog is sort of an odd size. I ordered the medium, but they ended up being way too big. I sent them back without any problems and reordered the small size. Which were delivered promptly. The small is a bit snug, but I fixed up an extender which makes them perfect. They stay on pretty good. Unless Smokey (my fat little dog) gets too carried away, rolling around and acting crazy. But these wash up nicely. Great service from Pet Magasin. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Rowe

customer_reviews.title: Wide Velcro makes them comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My miniature poodle is house trained, except that he and the other male dog mark territory inside and out. These diapers have a fairly thick pad built in, so I can leave my boys in the house alone for a few hours. Overnight, I still use a women’s incontinence pad inside the diaper. These diapers wash well and dry quickly. I like the wide Velcro because it prevents the diaper from bunching up.
customer_reviews.author: Poodle mom 3

customer_reviews.title: Not the size I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small size and it said small on the package but it was so not small. fit on over half of his little body. I would be leary of ordering from this supplier again as the size while saying the right thing on the package was not the size I ordered. Ordered from someone else and got the right size so I know it's not suppose to be that big.
customer_reviews.author: k.m.r.j. Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine for when my female goes into heat. These worked great on my male. The couldn't get the job done. I also accidentally for got to take it off a few times when I let him out in the morning. They do their job and absorbing pee and they never leaked on him. I just washed them off with the water hose and put them in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Texas girl

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the fit and absorbency. My dog doesn’t seem to mind wearing it either. I would have given easy to clean 5 stars but when you wash them the Velcro sticks to each other & it’s very difficult to pull it apart. Overall I am very pleased with them and ordered another set.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My poor sweet pup had to take steroids for a bulging disc. He was drinking a TON of water because of the steroid and had trouble holding his bladder. We kept on him but these bands were there just in case we didn't get him out on time! We still use them at night just for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: MsSuzie

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use them yet
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my little doxie all of a sudden started going in two places in the house. The enzymatic cleanser did not stop him. He is persistent. We went through a two day reform course in potty training. Now he is being a good little dog and I haven't had to use them as of yet. I am going away next week and things may change with my husband in charge of the dogs. So we will find out if he has to use them.
customer_reviews.author: CoCo's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Floor saver!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these! It has been below zero this winter, and my 2 small, very senior dogs do not want to go out. My female will use piddle pads faithfully, but my male pug likes to vary his areas in the house. I use these, fold an old white wash cloth inside for extra absorption, and no pee in the house. I do make sure I wash him off, and let him dry completely before applying a drying a new wrap.

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small dog and when he gets excited he leaks. These are perfect for him. Really easy to put on and he can't get them off. My mom uses these for her 14 year old Golden Retriever and that's how I knew about them. These are a must have for any dog who has excitement piddle or simply incontinent. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue R.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Velcro space.
customer_reviews.text: What I noticed first about these was the amount of Velcro giving you a lot of room for sizing just right. Others I have bought have less than half the size of Velcro and one brand is a bit tight on my 95lb boxer. They seem to be equally as absorbent as others. However at night he does leak through occasionally. I’m so happy I have purchased these. My dog is a literal “leaker” all the time and this has saved me so much time and laundry!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hochstedler

customer_reviews.title: FIT IS PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: UNABLE TO ACTUALLY REVIEW PRODUCT SINCE MY RAT TERRIER SOMEHOW WIGGLES OUT OF IT AFTER I PUT IT ON. FIT IS PERFECT BUT HE STILL MANAGES TO GET IT OFF. RAISES HIS LEG & PEES EVERYWHERE. WOULD PROBABLY WORK WELL IF HE WOULD KEEP IT ON!
customer_reviews.author: jubeli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for male dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something to keep your male dog from peeing everywhere when he gets excited. This is very easy to use and works perfectly. The dog didn't like it the first few times but quickly adjusted and it doesn't bother him now. It also seems to keep him from peeing when he gets excited, it just seems to be a reminder to stop him which is great.
customer_reviews.author: cdjrh

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for visitor  anxiety
customer_reviews.text: I have a GSD who is rescue and has visitor anxiety. Loves them but pees a bit whenever anyone comes to the house. These are perfect. I put the band on before visitors arrive and he does his thing then I remove it once he has calmed down. No more peepee drips on tile. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nana22 FL

customer_reviews.title: These work!
customer_reviews.text: They look huge, but when you get them on the dog, they sort of adjust and look smaller. The design does a great job preventing leaks even when the dog stretches out. The pad is very absorbent and does its job, but if your boy pees rather than marks, you may want to use a liner so you don’t have to launder them so frequently. I dry them on “air dry low” (not low on heated drying, but air dry with a tiny bit of warmth) and it takes an hour at least. Line drying takes 2 days (because they're so absorbent!).
customer_reviews.author: Jan Girando

customer_reviews.title: excellent price for QUALITY product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these wraps for my 18-year-old terrier who leaks often. Instead of using disposable wraps, I decided to use these wraps with female sanitary pads for my pup. They work great and it's easy to wash and dry in a laundry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Pei-Fen

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I can't give a totally honest review just yet. My dog never marks at my home. It only happens if he feels insecure when we're out. I can say that if I was using the wrap alone, it would have been too large for my Manchester Terrier. I'm putting this over top of diaper wrap, therefore it's fine. I purchased the medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great. Wide for extra comfort over previous purchased diapers.
customer_reviews.text: I shaved the dog and OOPs he needed a different size! On a whim I ordered these and I am so happy with them. I change my little boy 4x a day. I like that they were wider than the previously purchased ones because, they seem like they would be more comfortable. I do add a reusable pad in for extra absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself!
customer_reviews.text: These belly bands have made a huge difference in my life. Our two small elderly male rescue doggies like to ‘ mark’ in new environments. We just moved into a new home and it would have been a nightmare. Thanks to these absorbent, reasonably comfortable items, the anticipated problem was never a issue.
customer_reviews.author: LAW

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this diapers, I purchased them for my Chihuahua mix dog, he weight 7 pounds. The only reason why I don't give 5 stars, it is because they slip out my dog. I am trying to tight them well, but I haven't been able to figure out how he manages to loose them, every time I find them on the floor (closed).
customer_reviews.author: GOOSE  RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered these for my sisters shih tzu. This is the second set I’ve gotten for her since her 3 year old male dog refuses to be completely house trained and has to wear one at all times indoors. She swears by them and just needed another set to round out the week. If you have a “territory marker” problem these are the perfect solution. Will probably be ordering again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Freeman

customer_reviews.title: With a senior dog that drinks and pees a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: With a senior dog that drinks and pees a lot of volume at one time, these diapers were able to hold it without leaking. I did end up using a sanitary pad as a liner though just for extra protection. But even without a pad, the diaper stays dry on the outside because of the type of outer material. Fit true to size. Wide area of velcro helps them stay on securely
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my dog that has recently been marking on everything. They are very well made and have held up great in these last few weeks. I've washed them all maybe 3-4 times and they are still just as durable and soft as they were when they arrived. The colors are just like the picture. They hold a lot of liquid, too. My dog is also scared of storms and he pottied in one during a storm and it didn't leak at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tressy S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I subtracted a star is the sizing. I bought these in Medium and in Small. The smalls are too tight and mediums are too big. Otherwise great product. No leaks, nice quality, sturdy and able to stand up to repeated washing (no dryer). They do not slip and the only way my dog can get one off is if I don't have it on good to start with and he REALLY goes after it. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is off, and my dog can wiggle out of these...and he's 15. Also, the amount of velcro that is left over on the side pulls everything. All of my throws have picks from the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: BeckyMc

customer_reviews.title: These binders stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Our dog had a surgery that required drains & discharge. After struggling with t-shirts, bandages that would not stay in place or leaked I ordered these dog wraps. They worked great. They stay in place, the Velcro is the best quality & does not pop open when the dog moves. They kept the drainage from getting on my carpets & furniture. The only complaint I have is that I ordered the wrong size. I should have ordered an X-large but we managed with the large. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hazard

customer_reviews.title: Protecting my new floors and carpets!
customer_reviews.text: Love our little Maltese, but he gets a bit of separation anxiety and will mark things when we are out. These are easy to put on, don't seem to bother the little guy and work great. So nice to not have to come hunt out marking spots and scrub carpet anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chadgetsbored

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Old Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for old Chihuahua that just pees when and where it suits him! Bandit is 8 lbs, the size small fits fine, if there was an xs that might've been better just so there isn't Velcro overhang, but no issues really.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Not the best, but not the worst.
customer_reviews.text: These wraps are much too large for our barrel chested pup. I will have to cut and sew each one because we need them, but they are ok. They are much larger in width than a few of the others we've gotten so I thought they'd stay put but they slip off pretty easily if we don't tighten the Velcro so tight it leaves marks. Not the best, but far from the worst.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and leak proof
customer_reviews.text: These "belly nappies" worked much better than previous brands we tried. They were easily adjustable for different girths to ensure our dog was comfortable. To the end, they were also soft but with elastic at the sides to hug the torso and prevent leaks. Since our old dog has some dementia, we bought this not just for bladder leaking but for his inappropriate peeing. We paired it with a maxi pad for overnight and it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Adair

customer_reviews.title: Don't know what I'd do without these!
customer_reviews.text: Our 85 lb. Boxer has had some incontinence problems since he had bladder stones. That was when I ordered Magasin Band Wrap Nappies the first time. He continues to have the dribbling problem so I just ordered Nappies again so I don't have to worry about running short of a clean one. The large size fits our dog well and since Boxer's have barrel chests, I had concerns before I received my first order. My concerns were unfounded! I would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: DebH80

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased this dog wrap does not leak through. Even when my “baby” an accident in his wrap, there is no leakage. Wish I knew about these wraps before my “baby” went through a $500. area rug. They are also soft and leave no irritation on my dog. Would highly recommend these wraps to all.
customer_reviews.author: sebastianlady

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR LARGE BREEDS
customer_reviews.text: I have an older German Shepherd who is not very large compared to his breed. He’s less than 90 pounds. I bought the largest size which should fit him fine, however while it was easily put on him at night I noticed this evening he has pressure sores on his penis from it. I think if I had a smaller dog it would’ve been great, but this brand might not fit the needs of larger dogs like him. Otherwise the quality was nice. They are also very easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Garnet Gladwish

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16 yr old male Westie with some kidney disease and if I am gone for several hours he cannot hold it. I am tired of cleaning the floor so I got these. They are wide but that is fine with me. The velcro is strong. I put a human poise pad in them and this is awesome. My dog took the medium. Highly recommend. Great value and will save your sanity.
customer_reviews.author: L. Baize

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful with Senior Beagle
customer_reviews.text: I put a long incontinence pad into the wrap and then put the whole thing on my old beagle every night. It saves me from waking up to a urine lake every night. In addition to the wraps, I use baby wipes on him every morning to make sure his skin stays healthy after being in the wrap for 8 hours. If there is a bit of red, I put some baby butt paste on it and the redness is usually gone by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: HailRain

customer_reviews.title: Great, Very Happy with them...
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful, I bought Med. for my Toy Poodle that weighs 17 lbs, they fit great. Thanks for making a great Belly Wrap Diaper for a great price. And they really do hold a full pee well..
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Quinn

product_meta.title: Pet Magasin Male Dog Belly Manner Band Wraps Nappies (3 Pack)
feature_bullets: Adjustable size accommodating to different body types: suitable for Small dogs and puppies, waist Size 13" To 15", adjustable and strong Velcro can fit a larger range of waist length and weight

【Machine washable】: easy-to-use Diaper wraps for dogs, cats, rabbits etc. Useful for untrained puppies and dogs that suffer from excitement urination. Durable and quality fabric that will last through many washings
【Absorbent & waterproof highly absorbent and with a waterproof outer layer to prevent leaks and damage to rugs, carpets, upholstered chairs and sofas. Best solution to your untrained puppy problem

【Soft & comfortable increases Acceptance and prevents discomfort and irritation. No "crinkly" Texture that causes many dogs to reject disposable diapers. Velcro closures are quick and easy to secure and won't stick to fur
Trusted by 300, 000+ customers - more than 2000+ 5 stars reviews with 300+ of Recommendation for dog & CAT owners

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
